Use registry ID to see FRS Facility Registry Service data on those EPA-regulated sites

Source: R/frs_from_xyz.R
frs_from_regid.Rd

Use registry ID to see FRS Facility Registry Service data on those EPA-regulated sites

frs_from_regid(regid)

Arguments

regid

vector of one or more EPA Registry ID codes used by FRS

Value

relevant rows of the data.table called frs, which has column names that are "lat" "lon" "REGISTRY_ID" "PRIMARY_NAME" "NAICS" "PGM_SYS_ACRNMS"

Examples

  frs_from_regid(testids_registry_id)
#>         lat        lon  REGISTRY_ID                  PRIMARY_NAME NAICS  SIC
#> 1: 43.00028  -76.69323 110019033810 HEJAMADA CAMPGROUND & RV PARK       8999
#> 2: 40.99173  -74.03191 110030509215                   KREJAM CORP           
#> 3: 41.38786  -73.43935 110044340807            NEJAME & SONS INC.           
#> 4: 40.77499  -74.15929 110056111559      LA VEJAMA DISCOUNT STORE           
#> 5: 30.25468  -90.94284 110056982323           GRACEJAMES ENT, LLC       7542
#> 6: 32.80406 -117.02753 110070538057             BEJAMIN HAFERTEPE           
#> 7: 33.66110 -117.86959 110070874073                     EJAM INC.           
#> 8: 33.70369 -117.86675 110071293460                      EJAM INC           
#>           PGM_SYS_ACRNMS
#> 1:      FIS:7-0540-00003
#> 2:       NJ-NJEMS:354362
#> 3:          SIMS:1513529
#> 4:       NJ-NJEMS:485659
#> 5:       NPDES:LAG750956
#> 6: RCRAINFO:CAC002995519
#> 7:       ICIS:3601252181
#> 8:       ICIS:3601439158
  frs_from_regid(110000307695)
#>         lat       lon  REGISTRY_ID                 PRIMARY_NAME NAICS  SIC
#> 1: 18.37269 -66.14207 110000307695 RAMCO CHEMICALS INCORPORATED       2842
#>          PGM_SYS_ACRNMS
#> 1: TRIS:00620RMCCH83EST
  frs_from_regid("110000307695")
#>         lat       lon  REGISTRY_ID                 PRIMARY_NAME NAICS  SIC
#> 1: 18.37269 -66.14207 110000307695 RAMCO CHEMICALS INCORPORATED       2842
#>          PGM_SYS_ACRNMS
#> 1: TRIS:00620RMCCH83EST
